title: Kindly Identify the Font :)
content:
Hello,

Kindly, advice both of the font in this picture.

I believe, that bottom one " [Country Wide Special Event](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060703/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Gothic725%20Bd%20BT%20-%20Bold&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=1de15edd22e1f96768be1fab0fc35869&wrap=2&text=COUNTRY) " is Gothic 725 Bold and Normal

I would really appriciate if you can correct me.  
Thanks.

Hasnain

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Silver-Black%20Logo_6149.JPG)

Font: 

 3rd Place; 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060703/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125

comments.content:
CWSE: close to [3rd Place](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060703/http:/www.dafont.com/bn3rd-place.font); probably a techy freebie; more: [Popstar Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060703/http:/www.ffonts.net/popstarregular.font), [Arkitech](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060703/http:/www.dafont.com/arkitech.font)  
COUNTRY WIDE SPECIAL EVENTS: [Arial](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060703/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/arial/)
